original_text: At that time, the moon will shine as bright as the sun. Light from the sun will be seven times brighter. It will be like the light of seven days at the same time! At that time, the Lord will make the wounds of his people better. He has hurt them, but now he will make them better. At that time, the moon will shine as bright as the sun. Light from the sun will be seven times brighter. It will be like the light of seven days at the same time! At that time, the Lord will make the wounds of his people better. He has hurt them, but now he will make them better.
korean_text: 여호와께서 자기 백성의 상처를 싸매시며 그들의 맞은 자리를 고치시는 날에는 달빛은 햇빛 같겠고 햇빛은 일곱 배가 되어 일곱 날의 빛과 같으리라

sentences.original_text: At that time, the moon will shine as bright as the sun.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 달은 해처럼 밝게 빛날 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: Light from the sun will be seven times brighter.
sentences.korean_translation: 햇빛은 일곱 배 더 밝을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: It will be like the light of seven days at the same time!
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 마치 이틀의 빛이 동시에 있는 것과 같을 것입니다!

sentences.original_text: At that time, the Lord will make the wounds of his people better.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 주님은 그의 백성의 상처를 낫게 하실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: He has hurt them, but now he will make them better.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들을 상처 입혔지만, 이제 그들을 낫게 하실 것입니다.
